claim: A map shows America's Favorite Fast Food restaurants.
label: false
explain:
On June 5, 2020, the Barstool Sports Twitter account shared an image of a map that supposedly showed America’s favorite fast food restaurants by state:

The map went viral, and soon, restaurant chains such as Long John Silvers, Rainforest Cafe, and Sbarro were trending on Twitter as social media users expressed confusion over how these chains were named the favorites in their states. 
This map, however, is not based on data from an authoritative source. This map is a prank created by Barstool Sports. 
The first hint is that this data was supposedly compiled by an organization called the Public Information and Statistics Society. Not only could we not find an official organization by this name, the acronym for this group is PISS, which, to say the least, is a bit suspicious. 
Barstool Sports’ punny follow-up tweet also points to the humorous intentions of this map:

This map of favorite restaurants also doesn’t add up, geographically speaking. For instance, the map claims that The Rainforest Cafe is Colorado’s favorite restaurant chain, despite the fact that there are no Rainforest Cafe locations in the state.
In short, this viral map supposedly showing the most popular restaurant chains by state isn’t real and was a joke shared by Barstool Sports that isn’t based on any data from a reputable source. In other words, the Barstool Sports and the Public Information for Statistics Society are just “taking the piss.”

”
Click through the below slideshow to see America 's other favorite fast food restaurant . Subway top the list of the country 's favorite fast food restaurant , beat out burger pusher McDonald 's , Burger King and Five Guys . America 's favorite fast food be n't deep fry or candy-coated , accord to a new study by market research firm Harris Interactive . The restaurant that score below that number be Arby 's , Chipotle , Church ’ s Chicken , Hardees , Jack in the Box , KFC , Long John Silver 's , Quiznos , Sonic America 's Drive-In , Taco Bell and White Castle . These study result show just how strongly Subway ’ s position around fast and healthy meal choice be resonate with consumer . This be the eighth year in a row that Subway have best it fast food competitor . “ For some time , the medium spotlight on obesity , diabetes , and heart disease , and the importance of make good meal choice away from home , have drive growth in the range and number of low calorie/better nutrition dish be offer in all type of restaurant . “ Subway ’ s consistently high ranking in the Harris Poll EquiTrend study clearly indicate that consumer be graduate from just say they ’ re interested in good nutrition choice in restaurant to actually change their purchase behavior , ” say Mary Bouchard , Vice President of Consumer Goods , Retail and Restaurant Research at Harris Interactive . The average score for all restaurant be 61.67 .

The average score for all restaurant be 61.67 .

reports.content: Per Thrillist , the American Customer Satisfaction Index 's annual study survey 22,500 Americans on their experience at fast food and chain restaurant in a variety of category . According to ACSI , Chick-Fil-A have the high customer satisfaction across the fast food AND the full-service restaurant category , score 87 out of 100 . For the third year in a row , Chick-Fil-A be name the nation 's top fast food restaurant in term of customer satisfaction , because how could you not be satisfy with a chicken sandwich dip in Chick-Fil-A sauce ? Using a 0-100 rating system , participant of the study rate each restaurant in category include food quality , restaurant cleanliness , and waitstaff behavior . Chick-Fil-A be already on it way to become the third-largest fast food chain in the U.S. , and with this customer satisfaction rate , it seem that the chicken expert will make it way to the top sooner than later . The result be then average into an overall score for industry and restaurant .

reports.content: While restaurant technology and restaurant service be always evolve , one former trend have since become a mainstay in the fast food scene . For the fourth year in a row , Americans have choose a chicken chain over burger place a the country 's top spot for fast food . Restaurants be rank in category like accuracy and quality of food order , the variety of item available on the menu , cleanliness of restaurant , behavior of the staff and website satisfaction . reports.content: Burgers be one of America ’ s favorite food , but there ’ s one clear winner among American burger chain , accord to a new survey . Market Force Information , a customer experience management company , conduct a survey of 7,600 American adult to find out their favorite fast-food restaurant — and in the burger category , one reign supreme . West Coast darling In-N-Out be top a America ’ s overall favorite burger chain for the third straight year , with Five Guys in second place . Meanwhile , 18 % of customer take out food directly from the restaurant , and 2 % get delivery either from the restaurant or through a third-party service . With stiff competition in the fast-food space , healthy food option remain a big opportunity . Participants be ask about their satisfaction level with their most recent visit and their likelihood to recommend the restaurant to others . Overall dining at burger restaurant have rise from last year . Though among the restaurant , visitor to In-N-Out have the few negative experience . McDonald ’ s rank last place in two category include staff friendliness and food quality . Of the 14 burger chain , Jack in the Box ( JACK ) , Wendy ’ s ( WEN ) , Carl ’ s Jr. , Burger King ( QSR ) and McDonald ’ s ( MCD ) be rank the least favorite among customer , with McDonald ’ s take last place .

reports.content: Its name might define fast food for many people , but McDonald 's do n't get much love from consumer . Consumers have name Chipotle the top-ranked fast-food chain for Mexican food , thanks to it high quality , healthy option and the cleanliness of it restaurant , among other attribute . Consumers rate Subway high for healthy option but say it need to work on it food quality and on make it restaurant more appealing , both inside and out . The restaurant be famously close on Sundays , and the chain have be embroil in controversy over issue include current CEO Dan Cathy 's opposition to same-sex marriage . Surveyed consumer give the chain strong rating for nutrition , friendliness and the warm look of it restaurant . Among the big pizza chain , Little Caesars be America 's least favorite . See which restaurant have the most satisfied and loyal customer . The industry earn a passing grade in this year 's restaurant report from the American Customer Satisfaction Index , which be base on interview with more than 23,000 customer . Chefs head for New York 's Adirondack Mountains twice a year just to show off their skill . The “ Eat Fresh , ” made-to-order sub take the fast-food industry by storm , and Subway be now the large quick-service restaurant on the planet , with around 42,000 location in over 100 country . In particular , they say Wendy 's have higher-quality food , be clean and have good atmosphere than McDonald 's and Burger King . Customers say Wendy 's be the best of the traditional fast-food burger `` Big Three . '' Taco Bell currently have more than 7,000 restaurant in nearly 30 country and have global expansion plan for India , Thailand and the U.K . Burger fan say it be worst for food quality and `` staff friendliness . '' Founded in Denver in 1993 , Chipotle be one of the new quick-service restaurant . The chain be try to win over millennials with new convenience food — like `` donut stick '' — and tech-focused upgrade , include mobile ordering . The chain be consider vegan-friendly , but survey respondent say it need to step up the quality of it food and put healthy item on the menu . Customers complain that there be n't enough healthy stuff on the menu , and that the quality of the food come up short . The food team try 30 different chicken product before settle on one .
